item.description:
The Manchester Group is arranging a trip to Webs, and I'm going so I thought I'd post the info so anyone else who wants to go can arrange to car pool. The date is the same date that Stephanie Pearl-McPhee, the Yarn Harlot, is going to be signing books at Webs. She'll be there at 2:00 pm. Webs is in Northhampton, MA, and their website is www.yarn.com. I will be bringing a car and others will as well. Contact me if you want to see if you can car pool out there.

Denise
item.name: Field Trip to WEBS!!!!
